# Invitation to Qualify: Wharf Reconstruction Project in Carmanville, NL

## Project Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites contractors to qualify for a wharf reconstruction project in Carmanville, Newfoundland and Labrador (NL).

### Tender Details

| **Field** | **Value** |
| --- | --- |
| Tender Reference Number | WS4254484499 |
| Solicitation Number | WS4254484499 |
| Publication Date | October 12, 2023 |
| Tender Closing Date | October 26, 2023 (14:00:00) |
| Expected Contract Start Date | November 27, 2023 |
| Expected Contract End Date | N/A |

### Solicitation Description

The project involves the reconstruction of the existing wharf facility in Carmanville, NL. The successful contractor will be required to provide all necessary plant, labor, equipment, and materials to complete the work in accordance with the specifications and accompanying drawings.

### Contract Requirements

* The contractor must perform the work within 160 weeks from the date of notification of acceptance of the offer.
* All work must be performed in accordance with the plans and specifications for Fisheries and Oceans Canada Project Number C2-00027-04-01.

### Selection Criteria

The contract will be awarded based on the lowest price submitted by the qualified contractors.

### Trade Agreements

This tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### Contact Information

Contractor contact: Edward Johnston (SPAC/PSPC)
Email: [edward.johnston@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:edward.johnston@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
Phone: N/A
